description: This file defines a React component named PortfolioTemplateA which renders a stylized portfolio video template. It includes schema validation with zod, defines several sub-components for headings, badges, and project cards, and utilizes remotion hooks for animation effects.

classes.name: Heading
classes.description: A React functional component rendering the main heading with animated opacity and Y translation.

classes.name: Badge
classes.description: A React functional component rendering a styled badge.

classes.name: ProjectCard
classes.description: A React functional component rendering individual project cards with animations.

methods.name: PortfolioSchema
methods.description: A zod schema defining the structure and validation rules for the profile data.

methods.name: PortfolioTemplateA
methods.description: Main React component rendering the portfolio template using provided profile data.
